getImportedKeysQuery: select 'FK_' || OBJECTNAME || '_' || TARGETOBJ as FK_NAME, 'PK_' || TARGETOBJ || '_' || OBJECTNAME as PK_NAME, OBJECTNAME as FKTABLE_NAME, TARGETOBJ as PKTABLE_NAME, KEYNUM as KEY_SEQ, PARENTKEY as FKCOLUMN_NAME, TARGETKEY as PKCOLUMN_NAME from LOGICALRELATIONSHIP join LRKEYS on LOGICALRELATIONSHIP.LOGICALRELATIONSHIPID = LRKEYS.LOGICALRELATIONSHIPID;
getExportedKeysQuery: select 'PK_' || OBJECTNAME || '_' || TARGETOBJ || '_' || LOGICALRELATIONSHIP.LOGICALRELATIONSHIPID as FK_NAME, 'PK_' || TARGETOBJ || '_' || OBJECTNAME || '_' || LOGICALRELATIONSHIP.LOGICALRELATIONSHIPID as PK_NAME, TARGETOBJ as FKTABLE_NAME, OBJECTNAME as PKTABLE_NAME, KEYNUM as KEY_SEQ, PARENTKEY as FKCOLUMN_NAME, TARGETKEY as PKCOLUMN_NAME from LOGICALRELATIONSHIP join LRKEYS on LOGICALRELATIONSHIP.LOGICALRELATIONSHIPID = LRKEYS.LOGICALRELATIONSHIPID;
